firstExample.title: First example
firstExample.text: Create a new table 'studentiImePrezime' and populate it with 'ime' and 'prezime' values from table 'studenti' where 'idSmjer' equals 17. Autocommit is enabled.

steps.query: CREATE TABLE studentiImePrezime (ime TEXT, prezime TEXT)
INSERT INTO studentiImePrezime SELECT ime, prezime FROM studenti WHERE idSmjer=17
CREATE TABLE studentiImePrezime (ime TEXT, prezime TEXT)
INSERT INTO studentiImePrezime SELECT ime, prezime FROM studenti WHERE idSmjer=17
